id.description: The unique identifier of the scorecard.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the scorecard was last updated.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the scorecard was created.

interview.description: Details about the interview related to the scorecard.

id.description: The unique identifier of the interview step.

name.description: The name or title of the interview step.

candidate_id.description: The unique identifier of the candidate for whom the scorecard is created.

application_id.description: The unique identifier of the job application associated with the scorecard data.

interviewed_at.description: The timestamp when the candidate was interviewed.

id.description: The unique identifier of the employee who submitted the scorecard.

first_name.description: The first name of the employee who submitted the scorecard.

last_name.description: The last name of the employee who submitted the scorecard.

name.description: The full name of the employee who submitted the scorecard.

employee_id.description: The unique identifier of the employee who submitted the scorecard.

id.description: The unique identifier of the interviewer.

first_name.description: The first name of the interviewer.

last_name.description: The last name of the interviewer.

name.description: The full name of the interviewer.

employee_id.description: The unique identifier of the employee who conducted the interview.

submitted_at.description: The timestamp when the scorecard was submitted.

overall_recommendation.description: The overall recommendation for the candidate based on the scorecard evaluation.

name.description: The name of the attribute being rated.

type.description: The type of attribute being rated (e.g., technical skills, communication skills).

note.description: Any additional notes or comments related to the attribute.

rating.description: The rating given to the attribute.

definitely_not.description: The rating indicating the candidate is definitely not suitable for the role.

no.description: The rating indicating a negative evaluation of the candidate.

mixed.description: The rating indicating there are mixed opinions about the candidate.

yes.description: The rating indicating a positive evaluation of the candidate.

strong_yes.description: The rating indicating a strong positive evaluation of the candidate.

id.description: The unique identifier of the question.

question.description: The question being asked during the interview.

answer.description: The answer provided for a specific question.
